attributes.action: appoint Ken Livingstone to a non-political role in the strategic development of London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ken Livingstone has an undoubted passion for London and a great knowledge of the city accumulated over many years of public service. To allow such a talent to be cast aside in the wake of the mayoral election results would be nothing short of a national disgrace.
